    • Method Detail

      • isPhatLootChest

        public static boolean isPhatLootChest(org.bukkit.block.Block block)
        Returns true if the given Block is linked to a PhatLoot
        Parameters:
        block - The given Block
        Returns:
        true if the Block is a PhatLootChest

      • getPhatLoot

        public static PhatLoot getPhatLoot(java.lang.String phatLootName)
        Returns the PhatLoot of the given name
        Parameters:
        phatLootName - The name of the PhatLoot to find
        Returns:
        The PhatLoot or null if there is none by that name

      • rollForLoot

        public static LootBundle rollForLoot(java.lang.String phatLootName)
        Rolls for loot of the specified loot tables. An empty list is returned if the PhatLoot of the given name does not exist
        Parameters:
        phatLootName - The name of the specified loot tables
        Returns:
        The loot that was given from the roll

      • getLinkedPhatLoots

        public static java.util.LinkedList<PhatLoot> getLinkedPhatLoots(org.bukkit.block.Block block)
        Returns all PhatLoots that are linked to the given Block
        Parameters:
        block - The given Block
        Returns:
        a list of PhatLoots linked to the Block

      • getAllPhatLoots

        public static java.util.Collection<PhatLoot> getAllPhatLoots()
        Returns all PhatLoots
        Returns:
        A collection of all PhatLoots

      • getAllPhatLootChests

        public static java.util.Collection<PhatLootChest> getAllPhatLootChests()
        Returns all PhatLootChests
        Returns:
        A collection of all PhatLootChests

      • getAllPhatLootChestBlocks

        public static java.util.ArrayList<org.bukkit.block.Block> getAllPhatLootChestBlocks()
        Returns all Blocks that are linked to a PhatLoot
        Returns:
        a List of Blocks that are PhatLootChests

      • loot

        public static boolean loot(org.bukkit.block.Block block,
           org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
        Forces the given Player to Loot the given Block if it is a PhatLootChest
        Parameters:
        block - The Block which may be linked to a PhatLoot
        player - The given Player
        Returns:
        true if the Block was linked and looted, false otherwise

      • loot

        public static boolean loot(org.bukkit.block.Block block,
           org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
           boolean autoSpill)
        Forces the given Player to Loot the given Block if it is a PhatLootChest
        Parameters:
        block - The Block which may be linked to a PhatLoot
        player - The given Player
        autoSpill - true if the Chest should spill its loot
        Returns:
        true if the Block was linked and looted, false otherwise

      • reload

        public static void reload()
        Reloads the PhatLoot plugin. This includes save data and config settings

      • saveAll

        public static void saveAll()
        Saves all plugin information. This includes loot tables, linked chests, and loot times. This is a lot of data writing and should not be called too often. It is better to save individual PhatLoots and only the modified information
